official_title: Kindness to Others or to Oneself: A Pilot Randomized Controlled Trial of Kindness Interventions to Enhance Well-Being in Breast Cancer Survivors
inclusion_criteria:
* Women previously diagnosed with stage 0-IIIA breast cancer
* Have completed treatment with surgery, radiation, and/or chemotherapy
* Have not had a cancer recurrence
* Have access to the internet and an active email account
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 19 Years
